sentence.Network_en: I thought the play was only mediocre.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为这部戏剧只是平庸之作。

sentence.Network_en: The student tried hard, but his work is mediocre.
sentence.Network_cn: 该生学习刻苦, 但学业平庸.

sentence.Network_en: The critics condemned the play as mediocre.
sentence.Network_cn: 评论家谴责那出戏为低劣产物.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... immediate a 即刻的；直接的 mediocre a 平庸的，中等的 medium n 媒介物.
平字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 平叛〖 putdownarebellion〗 平平〖 average;mediocre〗 平平常常〖 unnoteworthy〗.
medievalize 使中古化mediocre 平凡的mediocrity 平常
medio-twist 中等捻度mediocre 中等的mediophyric 中斑晶的

list.abs: Sinograma « 人 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 邑人[ townspeople] 庸人[ mediocre person;mat;matt] 用人[ servant].
一个单人旁一个谷，念什么？_百度知道 ... 俗乐[ folk music] 俗子[ mediocre person] 俗字[ characters in popular form].
He was a mediocre student ; his academic records were not excellent , but not bad , either ., 他是平凡的学生 , 成绩不优秀 , 也不坏.
Great spirits alway encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds ., 伟大的心灵总是遭遇来自平凡人的强烈反对.
"merely"... ... not merely 不单; 不只是; 不仅; merely mediocre 不过尔尔; is merely a gesture 只是一种姿态; 只是一种姿势.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French médiocre, from Latin mediocris 'of middle height or degree', literally 'somewhat rugged or mountainous', from medius 'middle' + ocris 'rugged mountain'

entry.def: If you describe something as mediocre, you mean that it is of average quality but you think it should be better.

sentences.sentence: "they improved the quality from mediocre to above average"

means.word_mean: 2. of no exceptional quality or ability;

sentences.sentence: "only a fair performance of the sonata"
"the caliber of the students has gone from mediocre to above average"
"there have been good and mediocre and bad artists"

auth_sentence.content: Friday we got another kind of mediocre jobs report.
auth_sentence.res_content: Friday we got another kind of mediocre jobs report.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Friday we got another kind of mediocre jobs report.

auth_sentence.content: With the mediocre Civic, self-sabotage is not unthinkable.
auth_sentence.res_content: With the mediocre Civic, self-sabotage is not unthinkable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With the mediocre Civic, self-sabotage is not unthinkable.

auth_sentence.content: To stay fully invested is to risk mediocre returns.
auth_sentence.res_content: To stay fully invested is to risk mediocre returns.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立即的,即时的;直接的,最接近的
stems_affixes.word_buile: im无+medi中间+ate……的→无中间的→立刻的
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
medi中间+ocre石山→中间的山→不是高山→平庸
inter在……之间+mediate调解→在中间调节→中间体,媒介物
medi中间+an表名词和形容词→adj.中间的 n.[三角形]中线
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+ion表名词→n.调解
mediate[v.调停,作为引起……的媒介]+or人→n.调停者,仲裁人
medi中间+ate表动词→在[中间]走→调停,调解
